animeDescription: Special based on the manga by Ooya Kazumi, published in Betsukomi Flower Comics.  An all-male pop group doubles as a detective agency. The cute girl member of the agency is kidnapped when one of the men's past returns to trouble them all in the present.  (Source: sandg-anime)
animeStaff: [['Gotou Takayuki', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Mechanical Design', 'Character Design', 'Animation Director', 'Key Animation']], ['Matsuura Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Serizawa Rui', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Ishikawa Mitsuhisa', ['Production Coordination']]]
